head.title: Are we the right fit? - Contact us
head.description: Let's be partners, let's talk business. Contact us via WhatsApp or by filling out our form.

mailto.subject: Let's work together
mailto.body: Hi,%0d%0a%0d%0a My name is [Name and last name] and I’d like to meet with you.%0d%0a%0d%0a My main problem is [detail your problem or idea].%0d%0a%0d%0a I'd like to schedule a call to discuss my ideas in depth.%0d%0a%0d%0a ¡Cheers!

message.label: ¿what problem do you need to solve?

phonecheckbox.label: I want to be contacted by WhatsApp

success.p: Thanks for reaching out, we'll contact you as soon as possible.
